httplib (Used for the http requests to the soundwoofer.com API)
MIT
https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib

dr_wav (Loading IRs in the CabLib Node and SimpleCab Node)
Public domain
https://github.com/mackron/dr_libs


json (De-/Serialisation for web API requests and responses)
MIT
https://github.com/nlohmann/json


Hashing of user IR files
https://gist.github.com/nitrix/34196ff0c93fdfb01d51
